name: Mikró Kósmo
description:
Welcome to Mikró Kósmo !

It's a game about reconnecting worlds. A puzzle game where path ways are unlink.

As a player, you have to turn faces of each cubic planet to link path ways !

Controls : 

Only your mouse !

Team : 
  • Tom Rivaud - Game & Level Design
  • Moeva Mondoha - Code / VFX
  • Enzo Onesti - UI/UX Artist
  • Théo Gautier - Code
Constraints :

We took the Ludum Dare 38's theme to make this game, and we built this in 5 days !
